sentences.en: A cold engine needs a richer mixture to run satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 冷发动机需要较浓的混合气,才能可靠地运转.
一切都得到了令人满意的安排.

sentences.en: Everything is satisfactorily arranged on a sound basis.
Her disappearance has never been satisfactorily explained.
sentences.cn: 她的失踪一直没有得到令人信服的解释。

sentences.en: However he tries, he never seems able to work satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 不管他怎么努力, 他好像总不能令人满意地工作.

sentences.en: Joints between reinforcement members can be made satisfactorily with tin solder.
sentences.cn: 锡焊能够满意地做成加筋构件之间的接头.

sentences.en: Our complaint was dealt with satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 我们的投诉得到了满意的处理。

sentences.en: She fills the post satisfactorily , ie performs her duties well.
She is totally ineffective as a teacher, ie She cannot teach satisfactorily.
The goods sampled out quite satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 货物试样结果十分令人满意.

sentences.en: The problem has been solved satisfactorily at last.
The relations of friendly cooperation between our two countries are developing satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 我们两国的友好合作关系正在令人满意地发展着.

sentences.en: The young ladies in Amelia's society did this for her very satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 和爱米丽亚来往的小姐们把这一套儿做得很到家.

sentences.en: Their motives have never been satisfactorily explained.
sentences.cn: 他们的动机一直未得到令人满意的解释。

sentences.en: This kind of machine performs satisfactorily.
We cannot yet satisfactorily explain the genesis of the universe.
sentences.cn: 我们仍不能令人满意地解释宇宙的起源.

words.tran_cn: 满意的；符合要求的；赎罪的
令人满意的；令人满足的
满意，满足；赔偿；乐事；赎罪
满足；说服，使相信；使满意，使高兴

trans.tran_cn: 令人满意地，心安理得地，可靠地
trans.tran_en: good enough for a particular purpose
